content: moose mug dishcloth knit and wave moose mug dishcloth v2 0 1 introduction instructions you probably know the national lampoon s christmas movie this pattern can be knitted based on the given chart or follow the christmas vacation if not you should watch it it s my family s written instructions the written instructions are split into separate favorite christmas movie so it is probably no wonder that while parts to make it a little easier to follow watching it i got inspired to design and knit some dishcloth/washcloth for all of them the written instructions of this pattern are not fully tested any written instructions information about mistakes and unclear instructions are highly appreciated and can be sent via e-mail instagram or ravelry the first and the last five stitches on each side are edge stitches and are worked in seed stitch in the first row knit k1 p1 and repeat to materials end of row in the next row knit all purl stitches and purl all knit you will need the following materials stitches in the following the edge stitches are only written out for the cotton yarn in your favorite color roughly 85m / 50 g first two sections after that they will be referred to as edge you can o i ve used kurtenbach twister curly 8 uni 85m / 50g place 2 stitch markers after the first 5 stitches and before the last 5 o yarn usage depends on weight and needle size my stitches to help you count dishcloth required 35g of yarn matching needles for your yarn i used a 2 5 mm needle cast on 52 stitches because i wanted to achieve a denser fabric tapestry needle section 1 lower border row 1 7 abbreviations row 1 rs k1 p1 repeat to end st / sts stitch / stitches row 2 ws p1 k1 repeat to end k / k# knit / knit # number of stitches p / p# purl / purl # number of stitches row 3 -
